issue.title: [Rust] memory_pool.rs misses license header
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2438](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2438). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Travis output:

```Java

NOT APPROVED: rust/src/memory_pool.rs (apache-arrow/rust/src/memory_pool.rs): false
1 unapproved licences. Check rat report: rat.txt
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2438?focusedCommentId=16431968) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Thought that this was on master.....
